name: BadArmy
description:
This is a FPS game developed when I was a junior high student 1 year ago. The game is powered by Unreal Engine 3 and it includes DeathMatch and Team DeathMatch. You can change your team by pressing the "~" and then input "changeteam red/blue" in the game. And you can also set your name by pressing the same key and then input "setname xxx" in game. The game supports LAN online so that you can play this game with your friend  by unsing LAN. Some of the resources of the game come from the Internet. This is my first independent game and I hope that you would like it. Thanks for your playing.

If you failed to start the game, please install the Net 4.0 or the higher versions.
